description: "This mid-17th century Italian map is from Sir Robert Dudley's atlas ‘Dell'arcano del Mare’, the first maritime atlas to show the whole world, and the first to use the Mercator projection."
label: "A ilha e cidade de Goa metropolitana da India e partes orientais : que esta en 15 graos da banda do norte / auctor Ioannes Hugonius a. Linschoten ; Baptista à Doetechum sculp."
